themes: critique of change driven by a few voices or leadership ego
suggestion of bridge funding or phased rollout
key_phrases: Take time to do this right, but don't delay launching in August
very slightly modified changes that can be quickly and easily incorporated
bridge year in August, a small program like Nexus a few months after that, and the sweeping changes of a 'creative reset' sometime next year
Save bigger changes for next year when there is more time to thoughtfully consider and implement them
changing things either for the sake of changing them because ACME wants to put their stamp on things or because a few voices have reached those in power is a horrible idea
will exacerbate, not help, Austin's cultural ecosystem
barriers_identified: changes driven by a few influential voices or leadership ego
solutions_proposed: implement a bridge year of funding
make only very slight, easily incorporated changes for August launch
phase in a small program like Nexus after August
delay sweeping changes until next year for more thoughtful consideration
